name: P.A. Nick
description:
Nick is a (nuclear) Plant Admin (P.A.) and his job is to fix every emergency to prevent everything exploading.
How much will he last?

CONTROLS:

Controller:

D-Pad, A, B

Keyboard option A:

WASD, J (Controller A key), K (Controller B key)

Keyboard option B:

Directional Arrows, Z (Controller A key), X (Controller B key)
